proposal: Diving into the whimsical world of Pepe Lore, where Pepe the Frog's adventures are more than just a leap of imagination. 🐸 With 127 holders in the ETH network, your community is already hopping! Why not amplify this journey with our DEX or Lottery tools, letting anyone in your community create ripples of their own? Let's make Pepe's animated tales not just watched, but lived.
